We are now changing the 35th item that has been used as a justification for democracy intervention for years.
Article 35 TSK Internal Service Law; 27 May, 12 September, 28 February as a justification for the interventions.
We are lifting this shadow over our democracy. TSK and military service are being redefined. We are prevented from taking the responsibility from the situation.
Again, with this amendment, we believe that members of the TSK will not engage in political activities.
I wish this very important regulation to be beneficial to our country, our nation, our democracy.
Debate at @Europarl_EN on Irish #EU presidency. Excellent cooperation, impressive work and results. @eu2013ie
We will pass the Ramadan month with solidarity and sharing as we have done 365 days as AK Party organization.
No deal was more important than the political deal reached on the #MFF framework last week. We need this budget. @eu2013ie
We will identify the burning ducks with a closer proximity and extend the elimination to the mouth. We will show more compassion to children.
The dynamics of the negotiation process – unanimity in #euco, majority consent #EP requires that all sides move towards a consensus.
Concepts such as zakat and solidarity are not just religious concepts, but concepts that enable us to survive for centuries.
@EU_Commission goal was to that #MFF was workable and manageable. Initial #MFF more ambitious, but outcome respects principles and balance.
I pray that my Ramadan month will be instrumental for good for all humanity.
The solution process is an ongoing process that began with the establishment of our party.
We can not solve the problems that are so deep and neglected.
In such a struggle, everyone must be patient and self-righteous. If only we could solve all the problems. But this is not possible.
We intend to meet at a common value. We are trying to destroy the other side while doing one side.
Our state will protect our country, nation and flag until the end of one's honor and honor.
No sabotage and provocation can keep us from this blessed journey, and can not turn away from the solution.
Everybody wants a solution, not a conflict. Those who sabote the process will betray the nation. We do not compromise, we do not give up our principles.

Watch live now: press conference on #youth #employment in Berlin with Chancellor #Merkel http://t.co/CiBRnSV66U
We need to give #young people the hope and perspective they deserve wherever they live in the #EU.
Wir sind vereint, um Europas Jugend eine bessere Zukunft zu geben.
Today's discussions reflect #EU's commitment to decisively tackle #youth #unemployment.
While the main responsibility and financial means lie in the hands of Member States, the @EU_Commission can provide the European dimension
Role of the @EU_Commission is to act as a catalyst and complement national efforts. 5 areas of our added value:
1/ ensure implementation of country specific recommendations, including concrete structural reforms of labour markets
2/support Member States in their efforts to implement the Youth Guarantee and by frontloading the Youth Employment Initiative.
Berlin conference on #youthemployment good opportunity to exchange Europe-wide experiences, ideas how to stimulate job creation in practise
3/ accelerate work with Member States so that European Social Fund can provide extensive support
4/ promote cross-border mobility among young people
5/ ease transition from education to work, e.g. through European Alliance for Apprenticeships and ERASMUS+
Because we have long-term strategy to create growth-jobs, we need short-term actions #youthemployment
We cannot just await strong growth to foster jobs for young people #youthemployment
Important decisions by #euco summit last week for joint action on #youthemployment & help to SMEs. Now time for implementation
We cannot just await completion of banking union to combat financial fragmentation & credit crunches for SME #youthemployment
.@EU_Commission will continue to play an active part to promote growth, jobs and competitiveness.
The future of the #young is the future of #Europe. We cannot fail them.
Read my full press statement from Berlin Conference on #youthemployment http://t.co/Ex225nRQI2 http://t.co/ma0fpAmeIf
